mapper.select: select A.cart_no as cartNo, A.product_no as productNo, A.product_buy_price as price, A.product_amount as amount, A.customer_no as customerNo, A.cart_created_date as createdDate, B.product_name as productName, B.product_Image as productImage, B.product_discount_rate as discountRate from toy_cart A, toy_products B where A.product_no = B.product_no and A.customer_no = (select customer_no from toy_customer where customer_id = #{value})

select A.cart_no as cartNo, A.product_no as productNo, A.product_buy_price as price, A.product_amount as amount, A.customer_no as customerNo, A.cart_created_date as createdDate, B.product_name as productName, B.product_Image as productImage, B.product_discount_rate as discountRate from toy_cart A, toy_products B where A.product_no = B.product_no and A.cart_no = #{value}
